page.title: 16CATON SHEEP DOG TRIALS
page.content: The Caton sheep dog trials are held once every year next to the Tunnel plantation. Mr.Gorst organizes the sheepdog trials.Marks are scored out of 110.The object is to get the 5 sheep through two gates and into a pen. Each dog is allowed around 8 minutes to complete the course.The trials usually start at 7.30a.m. and carry on all day until it is too dark to continue.A dog's master controls the dog by whistling or calling.The winner receives a trophy and a cash prize. Around 80-100 dogs take part,coming from all over the country,some even from Scotland.
